data.message: Very cool, Facebook.  Now, with your last update or so any time I comment on a friend's post, my friends can also see and comment on that post -- even if they're not friends with the friend I commented on.  It's creeping everyone out.  Remind us how to turn off that setting.  I can't seem to find it this time.

replies.message: Hi Franny. Here's an overview of who can see what's on your profile and tools you can use to control what you share on your profile and Timeline: http://bit.ly/2e8VTCM. -Jessica
